alert.note: Alert for Iowa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:18PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iowa and southwestern Dane Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 718 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Mount Horeb, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Middleton, Verona, Mount Horeb, Cross Plains, Belleville, Black Earth, Barneveld, Blue Mounds, Ridgeway, Hollandale, Paoli, Pine Bluff, Blue Mound St Park, Mount Vernon, and Jonesdale. This includes U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 50 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
